languages.text: {n}Ксенос издает гадкий смешок.{/n} "Лишь то, что они блуждают, слепые и беспомощные, лишенные дома и всякой надежды... но почему я говорю тебе об этом? Разве не твоя обязанность стеречь свою семью, Изгой?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос издает гадкий смешок.{/n} "Лишь то, что они блуждают, слепые и беспомощные, лишенные дома и всякой надежды... но почему я говорю тебе об этом? Разве не твоя обязанность стеречь свою семью, Изгой?"

languages.text: {n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос издает гадкий смешок.{/n} "Лишь то, что они блуждают, слепые и беспомощные, лишенные дома и всякой надежды... но почему я говорю тебе об этом? Разве не твоя обязанность стеречь свою семью, Изгой?"

traits.locale_text: {n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?" {n}He turns his attention back to you before Yrliet can respond.{/n}

{n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?" {n}He turns his attention back to you before Yrliet can respond.{/n}

{n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"

{n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"

{n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"

languages.text: {n}彼は不快な笑い声をあげた。{/n}「盲目で無力で、故郷も希望も奪われさまようだけだがな…しかし、なぜこんなことをお前に話す必要があるのだ？同胞を見守るのはお前の義務だろう、流浪者よ？」
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は不快な笑い声をあげた。{/n}「盲目で無力で、故郷も希望も奪われさまようだけだがな…しかし、なぜこんなことをお前に話す必要があるのだ？同胞を見守るのはお前の義務だろう、流浪者よ？」

languages.text: {n}他发出了令人不悦的笑声。{/n}“我只知道，他们四处流浪，失去了家园与希望，不知该何去何从……但我凭什么要告诉你这些事情？照顾你的族人难道不是你的责任吗，流浪者？”
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他发出了令人不悦的笑声。{/n}“我只知道，他们四处流浪，失去了家园与希望，不知该何去何从……但我凭什么要告诉你这些事情？照顾你的族人难道不是你的责任吗，流浪者？”

languages.original_text: {n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"

languages.text: {n}Suelta una carcajada espantosa.{/n} «Solo que vagan, ciegos e indefensos, tras perder su hogar y su esperanza... pero ¿por qué tengo que contártelo? ¿No te corresponde a ti velar por tu gente, proscrita?».
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Suelta una carcajada espantosa.{/n} «Solo que vagan, ciegos e indefensos, tras perder su hogar y su esperanza... pero ¿por qué tengo que contártelo? ¿No te corresponde a ti velar por tu gente, proscrita?».

languages.text: {n}Il pousse un rire désagréable.{/n} « Seulement qu'ils déambulent, aveugles et impuissants, privés de leur foyer et de tout espoir... Mais pourquoi me demandez-vous ça ? N'êtes-vous pas chargée de les protéger, Errante ? »
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il pousse un rire désagréable.{/n} « Seulement qu'ils déambulent, aveugles et impuissants, privés de leur foyer et de tout espoir... Mais pourquoi me demandez-vous ça ? N'êtes-vous pas chargée de les protéger, Errante ? »

languages.text: {n}Er lacht unangenehm.{/n} "Nur dass sie wandern, blind und hilflos, ihrer Heimat und aller Hoffnung beraubt ... Aber warum erzähle ich Euch das? Ist es nicht Eure Pflicht, über die Euren zu wachen, Ausgestoßene?"
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er lacht unangenehm.{/n} "Nur dass sie wandern, blind und hilflos, ihrer Heimat und aller Hoffnung beraubt ... Aber warum erzähle ich Euch das? Ist es nicht Eure Pflicht, über die Euren zu wachen, Ausgestoßene?"

languages.text: {n}Zeno, sevimsiz bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Yuvaları ve umutları ellerinden koparılmış, kör ve çaresizce ortalıkta sürünüyorlar. Sana bunu neden söylüyorum ki? Türdeşlerini korumak görevin değil miydi Yurtsuz?"
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out an unpleasant laugh.{/n} "Only that they wander, blind and helpless, robbed of their home and hope... But why am I telling you this? Isn't it your duty to watch over your kin, Outcast?"
